definition: Jiayu Pass in Gansu, at the western terminus of the Great Wall/Jiayuguan prefecture-level city in Gansu
excellent/auspicious/to praise/to commend
surname Jia
valley
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve

Jiayuguan prefecture-level city in Gansu
Jiayuguan fort in the Gansu corridor/Ming dynasty military fort, the western end of the Great Wall

sentences.english: From a historic perspective, Jiayuguan and the wall were mainly used for military defense.
sentences.chinese: 從歷史的角度，嘉峪關和城牆主要是用於軍事防禦。

sentences.english: It comes from the Qilian Mountain and flows though about 35 kilometers within Jiayuguan.
sentences.chinese: 它發源於祁連山，流經大約35公里進入嘉峪關地區。

sentences.english: Ulay started from the western end of the Wall, the Jiayuguan Gate in the Gobi Desert walking eastwards.
sentences.chinese: 烏萊從西面位於戈壁的嘉峪關出發，向東行走。

sentences.english: The Great Wall begins in the east from the Shanghaiguan Pass and ends at the Jiayuguan Pass in the west.
sentences.chinese: 長城東起山海關，西至嘉峪關。

sentences.english: Yeah, but in Jiayuguan, the wall of bricks must be made noticeable.
sentences.chinese: 是的，但是在嘉峪關，用磚塊來造的牆一定很顯眼。

sentences.english: Hopefully I can bring you the picture what Jiayu Pass is about and how does it relate to the Silk Road.
sentences.chinese: 希望我能找出嘉峪關以及它與絲綢之路有關聯的照片。

sentences.english: This is a coal-fired power plant in Jiayuguan, Gansu province.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲甘肅省嘉峪關的燃煤電站。

sentences.english: Economic growth makes the environmental pressure increased heavily in the city of JiaYuguan.
sentences.chinese: 嘉峪關市的經濟增長使環境壓力日益加重。

sentences.english: The Great Wall east to Shanhaiguan, West to Gansu and east to Jiayuguan, the Yalu River.
sentences.chinese: 長城東起山海關，西至甘肅嘉峪關，東至鴨綠江。

sentences.english: The Jiayu Pass has been standing here for 631 years.
sentences.chinese: 嘉峪關距今已有631年的歷史。

sentences.english: Jiayuguan sits along one of the narrowest parts of the Hexi Corridor.
sentences.chinese: 嘉峪關所在的地方，是河西走廊最狹窄的區域之一。
